mapper.select: SELECT no, memberNo, contents, regdate, boardNo, r FROM(SELECT no, memberNo, contents, regdate, boardNo, rownum r FROM(SELECT no, member_no memberNo, contents, regdate, board_no boardNo FROM comments WHERE member_no = #{no} ORDER BY regdate DESC)) WHERE r BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(*) FROM comments WHERE member_no = #{memberNo}

select no, memberNo, nickname, contents, regdate, boardNo, commentLikeCount, r from(select no, memberNo, nickname, contents, regdate, boardNo, commentLikeCount, rownum r from(select c.no, c.member_no memberNo, nickname, contents,c.board_no boardNo, c.regdate regdate, NVL(l.commentLikeCount,0) commentLikeCount from comments c, members m, (select post_no, count(post_no) commentLikeCount from likes where type = 'C' group by post_no) l where m.no =c.member_no and l.post_no(+) = c.no and c.board_no = #{no} order by regdate desc)) where r between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.insert: insert into comments(no, member_no, contents, regdate, board_no) values(comments_seq.nextval, #{memberNo}, #{contents}, systimestamp, #{boardNo})
